---
title: "git_provided_with_backend_type.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for a system that uses Git as its storage type. It specifies the Git repository URL and configures a local backend for Git operations.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block that defines the storage settings for the system.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the storage type as "git"
- Contains nested configuration for Git-specific settings

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Defines the type of storage to be used by the system.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "git" |

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains Git-specific configuration settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the Git repository URL
- Defines the backend configuration for Git operations

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The Git repository URL using SSH format |

### `storage.git.backend`
#### Description
Defines the backend configuration for Git operations.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the backend type as "local"
- Provides the local path for Git operations

### `storage.git.backend.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of backend to be used for Git operations.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The backend type, set to "local" |

### `storage.git.backend.path`
#### Description
Defines the local file system path where Git operations will be performed.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| path | string | The local file system path for Git operations |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | Specifies the storage type as "git" |
| storage.git.repository | string | N/A | The Git repository URL using SSH format |
| storage.git.backend.type | string | N/A | Specifies the backend type as "local" |
| storage.git.backend.path | string | N/A | The local file system path for Git operations |

This configuration file is likely used as test data for a system that supports different storage backends, with this specific example showcasing a Git storage type with a local backend. The file path suggests it's part of a test suite for configuration parsing or validation.
